EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Lean Startup Conference_Q415.Follow Up - Booth
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at Lean Startup!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for visiting Pivotal at The Lean Startup Conference <[[http://leanstartup.co/conferences/lean-startup-conference-2015/]]> in San Francisco. We hope you enjoyed learning about the Lean Startup methodology and how lean thinking and agile development are helping to innovate and transform businesses.
In case you missed anything, hereâ€™s a quick recap:
- Watch <[[http://pivotal.io/event/leanstartupconf]]> the session Minimum Viable Taxes: Lessons learned building an MVP inside the IRS, co-presented by Pivotal and the IRS. - See <[[http://pivotal.io/event/leanstartupconf]]> highlights from our special lunch sessions, The Real Meaning Behind Software Transformation for Businesses Today and Lean Startup Is Management: A Panel Discussion with Entrepreneurs. - Read the blog story <[[http://leanstartup.co/the-change-imperative-why-pivotal-advocates-lean-startup-management-practices/]]>, The Change Imperative: Why Pivotal Advocates Lean Startup Management Practices, Contributed to Lean Startup by Janice Fraser, Director of People at Pivotal.
Want more?
- Learn how <[[http://pivotal.io/customers#labs]]> our customers work with Pivotal to transform the way they build and release products, drive decisions and interact with customers. - Apply <[[http://pivotal.io/office-hours]]> for a Pivotal Labs Product Office Hours session to workshop a specific product or design challenge and walk away with actionable advice - all completely free of charge and confidential! - Explore <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal]]> the Pivotal Podcast Series, which includes interviews and discussions about how organizations can be more open, agile and cloud-ready.
We look forward to seeing you at the next Pivotal event <[[https://pivotal.io/news-events#events]]>!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
